FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about Pigeon Map

1.question: What is Pigeon Map?
1.answer: Pigeon Map is a modern platform designed for pigeon fanciers to track, manage, and share their pigeon flights and pedigrees online. It offers comprehensive tools for breeding management and flight tracking.

2.question: How do I register for Pigeon Map?
2.answer: You can register by clicking the 'Register' button and filling out the registration form. After registration, you'll receive a confirmation email that you need to verify before you can start using the platform.

3.question: Is Pigeon Map free to use?
3.answer: Yes! Pigeon Map is 100% free to use. All features are available without any subscription fees or hidden costs. We believe in supporting the pigeon racing community with free access to all our tools and services.

4.question: Is Pigeon Map an app?
4.answer: Pigeon Map is a web-based platform that works in your browser. While it's not a native mobile app, it's fully optimized for mobile devices and works perfectly on smartphones and tablets. You can even add it to your home screen for app-like experience.

5.question: Can I use Pigeon Map on my mobile device?
5.answer: Yes! Pigeon Map is fully responsive and works seamlessly on smartphones, tablets, and desktop computers. You can access all features from any device with an internet connection.

6.question: How do I track my pigeon flights?
6.answer: Once logged in, you can add flights through the dashboard. Enter flight details, upload GPS data if available, and track your pigeons' performance over time with detailed analytics and maps.

policyPrivacy.Title: Privacy Policy
policyPrivacy.Administration: The controller of personal data in the generally available Regulation (EU) of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to access to personal data and on free access to such data and the exercise of the repeal 95/46/EC (hereinafter: regulation) is the company DIGGING Barbara Skrzypnik, NIP 8791530559, Sikorowo 32, 88-100 Inowrocław.
policyPrivacy.CollectedDataDescription: The PIGEON MAP application collects the following personal data from users: email, username, name and surname, numerous, all data is downloaded to improve services and marketing goals. District, branch, sections (concerns participation in pigeon racing) to perform application services. Mistakes, Flight data (flight name, flight date, date end of the flight, place of pigeon release, name of the loft, Coordinates of the loft, participating users, managing flight) are downloaded to perform the service, improve providing service.
policyPrivacy.DataShareDescription: Users have the option of providing information about their flights to other users. The disclosed data include:, flight name, flight date, flight end date, pigeon release place, loft name, pigeon coordinates, participating users, flight managing. Shared flights can be viewed on the map in the application.
policyPrivacy.ConsentToSharingDataDescription: In the case of participation in pigeon races (competition flights), as well as private flights, the user must agree to provide data related to these events. Without user consent, flight data will not be made available to other participants of the event.
policyPrivacy.DataRemovalDescription: Users have the ability to delete some data related to pigeons, release places and flights. It is worth noting that data deletion includes information related to the loft themselves, release places and flights, not personal data such as email, phone number, name or surname. Personal data is stored in accordance with applicable legal regulations and a privacy policy.
policyPrivacy.PurposeOfDataCollectionDescription: Personal data is collected to enable the use of the Pigeon Map application function, including participation in pigeon races, browsing flights on the map and improving errors in services and for marketing purposes.
policyPrivacy.DataSafetyDescription: The Pigeon Map team is committed to ensuring the security of the collected data. Appropriate security measures are implemented to protect data against unauthorized access, loss, damage or unauthorized disclosure.
policyPrivacy.RightToAccessCorrectAndDeleteDataTitle: Right to access, correct and delete data
policyPrivacy.RightToAccessCorrectAndDeleteDataDescrip: Users have the right to access their personal data, correct and delete them. Please contact us in order to exercise these rights. Email: kontakt@digging.pl
policyPrivacy.LegalBasisDescription: The Privacy Policy of the Pigeon MAP application is based on the principles of the general regulation on the protection of personal data (GDPR) and other applicable provisions regarding the protection of privacy. The processing of users' personal data is based on one of the following legal clauses: the user's consent, the implementation of the contract, and legal obligation.
policyPrivacy.TargetDescription: The Privacy Policy aims to ensure full protection of the Privacy of Pigeon MAP Users, in accordance with current legal regulations regarding the protection of personal data.

ForgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?
ForgotPassword.successMessage: If an account with this email exists, a password reset link has been sent.

Error.WRONG_PASSWORD_OR_USERNAME: Incorrect username or password. Please try again, or if you don't have an account, click the registration button.
Error.USERNAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: This username is already taken. Please choose another one.
Error.EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address. For example: map.pigeon@email.com
Error.EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: This email address is already in use. Please choose another one.
Error.PHONE_NUMBER_INVALID: Please enter a valid phone number with a country code. Remember that the phone number is optional. For example: +48123456789
Error.PHONE_NUMBER_ALREADY_EXISTS: This phone number is already in use. Please choose another one.
Error.USERNAME_TOO_SHORT: Please enter a username with at least 4 characters.
Error.PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Please enter a password with at least 6 characters.
Error.DIFFERENT_PASSWORDS: Please enter the same password twice.
Error.EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Your email address is not verified. To continue, check your email and verify your account.
Error.OPEN_FLIGHT_REFER: Error message, reference to open flight
Error.OPEN_FLIGHT_REFER_TYPE: Error message, type of reference to open flight
Error.END_TAG_NOT_POSSIBLE: Error message, end tag not possible
Error.OPEN_FLIGHT_CREATE_ONLY_PLANNER: Error message, creating open flight only for planner
Error.DEFAULT_TAG_IS_NOT_COTE: Error message, default tag is not a cote
Error.USER_IS_NOT_REGULAR: Error message, user is not regular
Error.REQUEST_IS_PROCESSED: Error message, request is being processed
Error.OPEN_FLIGHT_REFER_OWNER: Error message, reference to open flight owner
Error.OPEN_FLIGHT_UPDATE_NOT_ALLOWED: Error message, open flight update not allowed
Error.DISTRICT_BRANCH_SECTION_NOT_MATCH: Error message, district, branch and section do not match
Error.PIGEONMAP_TYPE_USER: The given username/email is registered, but to log in you need to enter the email (username) and password and press the login button.
Error.OUTSIDE_TYPE_USER: The given username/email is registered, but you need to use a different authentication. Try to authenticate with the buttons to the right of the 'Log in' button
Error.CANNOT_UPDATE_FLIGHT: Check if you have all the necessary data, i.e. flight name, place of release, dovecote and start date.
Error.FINISH_FLIGHT_UPDATE_NOT_ALLOWED: You cannot update the flight because it has already been completed.
Error.FLIGHT_UPDATE_NOT_ALLOWED: You cannot update the flight. Check if you are the owner and if the flight has already been completed.
Error.ALREADY_JOINED_FLIGHT: You have already joined this flight
Error.FLIGHT_DELETE_NOT_ALLOWED: Removing the flight is not possible, check if the flight belongs to you
Error.JOIN__NOT_ALLOWED_ANOTHER_DISTRICT: You cannot join this contest because the user who created the flight is in a different branch.
Error.NOTFOUND: Object with the given identifier not found
Error.FORBIDDEN: Access to the resource is denied
Error.ALREADY_EXISTS: Object with the given identifier already exists
Error.DEFINED_SEX_IS_CHANGED: Cannot change defined sex (it can be changed only once)
Error.NOT_FERTILE_EGG: Cannot hatch an egg that is not fertile
Error.PIGEON_NOT_ACTIVE: Cannot perform actions on an inactive pigeon
Error.INVALID_MOVE: Cannot change the order of the pigeon in the list. Check if the group and season are correct.
Error.EGG_IS_BORN: If the pigeon was hatched in the Pigeon Map system, the parent cannot be changed
Error.DATE_OF_LAYING_EMPTY: Please fill the date of laying
